abstract: Op-Ed article by former defense contractor Sean McFate notes rising use of paid mercenaries as services of all-volunteer armies fall short across globe, leading to fears of rampant abuse and criminal activity by contractors; contends best way to ensure proper conduct among military contractors is market power, rewarding good firms with profitable contracts and withholding them from bad firms.
lead_paragraph: Mercenaries are here to stay, and the best way to control them is through the marketplace.
